properties.Name: Bike Repair Station
properties.Description: Small fix-it station. No bike rentals available.

properties.Name: Bike Repair Station
properties.Description: Small fix-it station. No bike rentals available.

properties.Name: James City County Marina Bike Rental
properties.Description: Bike rentals include 2 hour, 4 hour, and all day rates.

properties.Name: Adventures in RVA
properties.Description: Adventures in RVA has rental bikes for every kind of rider! Adventures in RVA rents mountain bikes, touring bikes, tandems, and street bikes by the hour, day or week. We rent bikes to singles, couples, families and groups. Enjoy Richmond’s Capital Trail, cruise Belle Island or tour the city’s attractions. We have a bike to match your need and budget.

properties.Name: Shift Bicycles
properties.Hours: Open Monday – Friday 11am – 5pm (Call for weekend hours)
properties.Description: $25 for 3 hours; $35 for up to 24 hours – Ride the first day, take it to your hotel, ride again the next morning and return by noon. This is THE best bang-for-the-buck. $60 Two full days; $200/week – There is no finer way to see the city for extended visits. We’ll even give you our favorite “do-not-miss” rides list. Unlimited expert advice on the best sights, foods, drinks and more are handed over on a silver platter.

properties.Name: The Kickstand
properties.Description: The Kickstand is much more than the easiest (and coolest) way to get on a bike and enjoy the Virginia Capital Trail. It's also revolutionary social enterprise aimed at providing employment for youth in Richmond's public housing neighborhoods, while raising funds for the nation's premier inner-city youth cycling program.

properties.Name: Kul Wheels
properties.Description: Kul Wheels provides fun electric bike tours and rentals through everyone’s favorite river city and along the Virginia Capital Trail. Explore the city and the trail in a new way and learn why electric bikes can be such a blast.

properties.Name: Conte's Bike Shop
properties.Description: We are proud to offer you both bicycles and accessories from prominent brands such as Giant/Liv, Cannondale, Specialized, Electra and more. Having a hard time deciding between them all? Come in and visit with our crew at Williamsburg, and we will point you in the right direction. Great experiences and beautiful bikes are what we provide, every day.

properties.Name: Richmond Rides
properties.Description: Bike tours that include: Church hill signature tour, Foodie tour, Richmond Highlights, and Along the River. Book online!

properties.Name: Balance Bicycle Shop
properties.Description: Balance Bicycle Shop is located near VCU in the heart of downtown Richmond, VA. They carry bicycle components, accessories, new bikes, and offer the best service and repair to keep you going strong.

properties.Name: Cyclus Bike Shop
properties.Description: Since 2008 our goal has been to promote the bicycle as economically and efficiently as possible. We hope to accommodate comfort riders, touring buffs, BMX bros, fixie fanatics and anybody else who loves the familiar feeling of pushing pedals.

properties.Name: Bikes Unlimited
properties.Description: We are proud to be an independent bicycle dealer (IBD). We're not a manufacturer's concept store nor a franchise. With your help, we decide what  the best products are and provide the most bang for our valued customers' dollar. We strive to provide the most eclectic selection of bikes, clothing and accessories in Williamsburg, with products you may not find elsewhere. If you would like to see us carry a product, we always welcome suggestions.

properties.Name: BikeBeat
properties.Description: BikeBeat is committed to building a more bicycle friendly environment, providing our community with quality cycling products, unyielding customer service, and a passion for bicycling's abundant opportunities.
